Should You Go Solar Now...Or Wait?
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
At Direct Energy Solar, this is one of the most common questions we run across:
Does it make more sense to install solar panels today, or are you better off delaying your purchase for a bit?
By delaying your decision to install PV panels, you often end up paying more—quite a lot more. Let’s discover why that is.
Discover why waiting to go solar does not pay: <[[http://www.directenergysolar.com/blog/post/should-i-go-solar-now-or-wait?utm_medium=email&utm_source=goorwait&utm_campaign=nurtur&utm_content=goorwait-button-discover]]>
“We tell people that if they’re going to make the decision to go solar, they should do it now. Now’s the time to do it, and to start reaping the savings.” - David and Mary
